items.name: init(image: NSImage, hotSpot: NSPoint)
items.desc: Initializes a cursor with the given image and hot spot.

items.name: var image: NSImage
items.desc: The cursor’s image.

items.name: var hotSpot: NSPoint
items.desc: The position of the cursor's hot spot.

items.name: class func hide()
items.desc: Makes the current cursor invisible.

items.name: class func unhide()
items.desc: Negates an earlier call to hide() by showing the current cursor.

items.name: class func setHiddenUntilMouseMoves(Bool)
items.desc: Sets whether the cursor is hidden until the mouse moves.

items.name: class func pop()
items.desc: Pops the current cursor off the top of the stack.

items.name: func pop()
items.desc: Sends a pop() message to the receiver’s class.

items.name: func push()
items.desc: Puts the receiver on top of the cursor stack and makes it the current cursor.

items.name: func set()
items.desc: Makes the receiver the current cursor.

items.name: class var current: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the application’s current cursor.

items.name: class var currentSystem: NSCursor?
items.desc: Returns the current system cursor.

items.name: class var arrow: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the default cursor, the arrow cursor.

items.name: class var contextualMenu: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the contextual menu system cursor.

items.name: class var closedHand: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the closed-hand system cursor.

items.name: class var crosshair: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the cross-hair system cursor.

items.name: class var disappearingItem: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns a cursor indicating that the current operation will result in a disappearing item.

items.name: class var dragCopy: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns a cursor indicating that the current operation will result in a copy action.

items.name: class var dragLink: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns a cursor indicating that the current operation will result in a link action.

items.name: class var iBeam: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns a cursor that looks like a capital I with a tiny crossbeam at its middle.

items.name: class var openHand: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the open-hand system cursor.

items.name: class var operationNotAllowed: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the operation not allowed cursor.

items.name: class var pointingHand: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the pointing-hand system cursor.

items.name: class var resizeLeft: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the resize-left system cursor.

items.name: class var resizeLeftRight: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the resize-left-and-right system cursor.

items.name: class var resizeRight: NSCursor
items.desc: Returns the resize-right system cursor.

items.name: class var resizeUp: NSCursor
